title: Wasn't Gragas ult gutted because of the same thing Lee Sins's ult does ?
body: Nobody plays Gragas anymore because he's clunky as shit. I played him since s5 and now I didn't touch him since the nerf. I just can't play with that dumb ult, but I see why it was nerfed. No counterplay when he E flashed and ulted you in his team... however my point is, lee sin does the exact same thing with his R flash with no counterplay. He also has for a while now a 25-35% pick rate. Sooooo, why was Gragas gutted through clunkiness to the point you never see him in games anymore and Lee 'the gold boy of riot' Sin can insec whoever he wants for years with 30% pick rates.... ???

TECHNICALLY the same can be said for gragas ult, but the issue with that was he didnt need to stun to get a good ult off. Now he needs to stun. It sucks, but I get why they did it.

Gragas ult is also ranged. Lee has to face-check the target.
The gragas nerf was that it always takes the same time for the ult to go off instead of going off when the barrel reaches the target.  Nothing about his ult was changed at range

The OP is asking why Grag's ult was stronger than Lee's (in terms of the displacement). Not how it was nerfed.

In that respect, the differences are:

-Targetability
Lee hits one person, Gragas hits an area.
- AoE
Lee displaces 1 person and maybe knock-up one or two more, Gragas' displaces entire teams.
- safety
Lee has to touch noses with his target, Gragas does it from 1000 range.

To be fair, you also have to predict movement with gragas ult since it is not point and click. So if you don't get an e knock-up its more difficult to land, especially if the enemies have their movement summoners up.

Lee ult while it is single target and melee range, it is point and click and locks the enemy in unless they flash frame perfect/cc cancel/buy a qss.

And don't forget that while gragas has e and flash to set up the ult, lee sin has q, w, and flash.

-salty former gragas main-

>And don't forget that while gragas has e and flash to set up the ult, lee sin has q, w, and flash. 

As a whole, Lee's kit makes him far worse than Gragas. We're only looking at the displacement power in their ults.

That said, Lee's mini-stun -> auto-hit is a fair point. But that still leaves them 3-1.
And that's why you don't compared two different abilities on two different champs.
Gragas' ult scattered entire enemy team. It is a much stronger team fighting tool. That's why Lee sin was never even picked if gragas was available until the nerfed him repetitively
Lee sin ult is not a ranged, AOE, AP nuke.
